a.n: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions: Dominic J. Marshall

p.k: This MotorMusic Jazz Sessions episode features the British Dominic J. Marshall trio. With his incredible energy and authenticity, Marshall is an indispensable musician to the European jazz scene!
p.d: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series 'Belgium Sessions'. In these sessions, some of Europe's finest musicians perform their own, original music. This MotorMusic Jazz Sessions episode features the British Dominic J. Marshall trio. With his incredible energy and authenticity, Marshall is an indispensable musician to the European jazz scene! Marshall is not only a piano virtuoso; he has an impeccable sense of timing, melodic elaboration, and musicality. In collaboration with Jamie Peet (drums) and Glenn Gaddum Jr. (bass), they create refreshing and innovative sounds.
